error.policy_uncheck_error: Please read and agree to our policy.
error.old_system_user_error: Our system has been upgraded, please click forget password button to reset your password.
error.confirm_password_error: Confirmed password does not match the new password, please enter again.
error.email_taken_error: The email has already been taken.
error.login_mismatch_error: Your email or password was entered incorrectly.
error.other_error: Somthing went wrong, please try later.
error.too_many_requests: Too Many Attempts, please try later.
error.username_taken_error: The username has already been taken.
error.verify_code_error: Verify Code error, please try again.

login.privacy_policy: By logging in, you agree to [Privacy Policy]({privacy_policy_url}).
login.title: Log in to Your Account

register.privacy_policy: I agree to User Agreement. Please see Our [Privacy Policy]({privacy_policy_url}).
register.title: Create Account

reset_password.subtext: Enter your email to receive instructions on how to reset your password.
reset_password.title: Reset Password

reset_password_submitted.subtext: You should receive a link in a few moments. Please open that link to reset your password.
reset_password_submitted.title: Reset Password

set_password.subtext: Minimum 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number
set_password.title: Set Your Password

username.name: Name
username.subtext: Your username can only be a combination of letters, numbers , _ and -

verify.activate_information: Please activate your account within 24 hours
verify.subtext: We have sent a verification code to your Email:
verify.title: Confirm your email
